message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000.  It's a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a good profit.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. That's the highest I can go.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $700,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of this product.  Let's meet in the middle and make this deal work.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid $850,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $700,000 and $850,000, so I'll offer $825,000. That's the best I can do.
